name: Spirits of Yendor
description:
Run! Fight! Resurrect good help and lead your ghostly heroes to victory!

This is a pre-Early Access build. The skeleton of a game is here, but there isn't music or sound yet.

This is a combination of Vampire Survivors, Nethack, and SNKRX, with a randomized loot system.

I'm 100% interested in any feedback people have. I can and will adjust what I've got here to make it more exciting for people to play.
